title: $:/plugins/tg/highlight-button
text:
{ "tiddlers": { "$:/config/ShortcutInfo/highlight": { "created": "20170407190020051", "text": "{{$:/language/Buttons/Highlight/Hint}}", "title": "$:/config/ShortcutInfo/highlight", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20171030143601259", "creator": "TonGerner" }, "$:/config/shortcuts/highlight": { "text": "Ctrl-H", "title": "$:/config/shortcuts/highlight", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20170407190121204", "creator": "TonGerner", "created": "20170407190116383" }, "$:/language/Buttons/Highlight/Caption": { "text": "apply highlight", "title": "$:/language/Buttons/Highlight/Caption", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20170409183014766", "creator": "TonGerner", "created": "20170409183007343" }, "$:/language/Buttons/Highlight/Hint": { "text": "Apply highlight", "title": "$:/language/Buttons/Highlight/Hint", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20170409183039048", "creator": "TonGerner", "created": "20170409183025428" }, "$:/core/images/highlight": { "text": "", "title": "$:/core/images/highlight", "tags": "$:/tags/Image", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20170726075221948", "creator": "TonGerner", "created": "20170407174051692" }, "$:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/highlight": { "created": "20170407173855291", "creator": "TonGerner", "text": "<$action-sendmessage\n\t$message=\"tm-edit-text-operation\"\n\t$param=\"wrap-selection\"\n\tprefix=\"@@.tgy \"\n\tsuffix=\"@@\"\n/>\n", "title": "$:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/highlight", "tags": "$:/tags/EditorToolbar", "shortcuts": "((highlight))", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20201226175334131", "icon": "$:/core/images/highlight", "description": "{{$:/language/Buttons/Highlight/Hint}}", "condition": "[!has[type]] [type[text/vnd.tiddlywiki]]", "caption": "{{$:/language/Buttons/Highlight/Caption}}" }, "$:/plugins/tg/highlight-button/readme": { "created": "20170511202748742", "creator": "TonGerner", "text": "\\define icn(icon)\n\n\\end\n\nA button (<>) that highlights a selection
\nAssigned shortcut: {{$:/config/shortcuts/highlight}}\n\n''Note:'' $:/plugins/tg/highlight-button/style contains the applied 'highlight' class `tgy`:\n\n{{$:/plugins/tg/highlight-button/style}}\n", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/highlight-button/readme", "tags": "", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20230827105856173" }, "$:/plugins/tg/highlight-button/style": { "created": "20201226175018758", "creator": "TonGerner", "text": "/* Standard yellow highlight */\n.tgy {\n background-color:Yellow;\n}", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/highlight-button/style", "modified": "20201226175523974", "modifier": "TonGerner", "type": "text/css" }, "$:/plugins/tg/highlight-button/license": { "created": "20210103204107712", "creator": "TonGerner", "text": "[[Highlight button|http://www.tongerner.nl/TW5/TW5_playground.html]] © Ton Gerner — 2018-2023\n\nMIT License: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/highlight-button/license", "tags": "", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20221229111425878" } } }
